long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid unhealthy reactions from toxic triggers or problematic people. SOS by Jovial is your 1-click rescue from bad habits, impulses, & toxic triggers.

🆘 Join a fake video call to excuse yourself from unhealthy situations.
🆘 Take back your time & serenity. 
🆘 You’ll use these quiet moments for self-reflection, relief, or rest.

Get relief & peace of mind. Your future self will thank you.

SOS is great for burnout caregivers, parents, & professionals working from home or in-office.

Keep your emotional well-being intact when issues pop up. Together, we can help you be your best self under pressure.

Say, Goodbye Nemesis
Deal with less stress.

🚫 Habits 
- Self-sabotage
- Negative thoughts
- Pettiness 
- Vengefulness 

🚫 Triggers  
- Arguments 
- Outbursts 
- Aggression 
- Interruptions
- Disregard Boundaries 
- Overworked 

🚫 Problems  
- Passive aggression 
- Microaggression 
- Mental abuse
- Verbal abuse
- Energy drainers
- Narcissists

Say, Hello Ally
Enjoy more breaks.

✅ Meditate
✅ Pray
✅ Daydream
✅ Reflect
✅ Plan
✅ Escape
✅ Laugh

SOS by Jovial is a free extension for instant help. No longer get caught off guard by negative triggers.


A friendly reminder. 
You deserve joy and a good life. Give yourself grace & a break! 👌🏾
